lyrics.ChnStr: 當初只是想幫你一個忙
lyrics.EngStr: Originally I just wanted to help you out

lyrics.ChnStr: 沒想到現在比你還淒涼
lyrics.EngStr: Never thought now I'm even more forlorn than you

lyrics.ChnStr: 你當時發毒誓明天就會還
lyrics.EngStr: You swore you'd pay me back tomorrow

lyrics.ChnStr: 錢拿了之後你就音信杳然
lyrics.EngStr: After getting the money, you vanished without a word

lyrics.ChnStr: 你早已看出我的慈悲心腸
lyrics.EngStr: You must have seen the mercy in me early on

lyrics.ChnStr: 你表演的沮喪實在很爛
lyrics.EngStr: Your act of being upset was truly pathetic

lyrics.ChnStr: 我竟然還會心甘情願上當
lyrics.EngStr: I actually willingly got fooled

lyrics.ChnStr: 我簡直就是超級大笨蛋
lyrics.EngStr: I'm basically a super big fool

lyrics.ChnStr: 把錢還給我吧
lyrics.EngStr: Give me back the money

lyrics.ChnStr: 請你看在老天的份上
lyrics.EngStr: Please, for heaven’s sake

lyrics.ChnStr: 我只是好心幫你一忙
lyrics.EngStr: I was just doing you a favor out of kindness

lyrics.ChnStr: 我這裡不是在開銀行
lyrics.EngStr: This isn’t a bank I'm running

lyrics.ChnStr: 把錢還給我吧
lyrics.EngStr: Give me back the money

lyrics.ChnStr: 那些錢都是我的血汗
lyrics.EngStr: That money was my sweat and toil

lyrics.ChnStr: 我要請你多多做作慈善
lyrics.EngStr: I want to ask you to do more pretend charity

lyrics.ChnStr: 我已經不介意叫你爹娘
lyrics.EngStr: I wouldn’t mind calling your parents for help

lyrics.EngStr: It’s just that simple

lyrics.EngStr: Give me back the money

lyrics.ChnStr: 就是這麼簡單
lyrics.EngStr: It’s just that simple
